summary: This adds a craftable Giant Club to the game. Embrace your inner Giant!
descriptionHtml:
Diem\'s Giant Club Initial Release by DiemCarpe

____________________________
Description:
____________________________
Hello and welcome to my third mod for Skyrim: Diem\'s Giant Club. You all may have seen a Giant in the landscape of Skyrim. Have you ever wondered why you can\'t use their clubs? Well, this mod lets you do something like that. With this mod, you can make your very own Giant Club! It uses the same animation in third person view as a giant, over the shoulder and insta kill wacking. I tried to implement the whole launch toward to moon thing but I can\'t seem to do that just yet. You need no perk to make the club and it can be crafted at and forge.

____________________________
Credits:
____________________________
G-d for making us
Bethesda for Skyrim and letting us mod it
SkyEdit team for making a user friendly editor
nexusmods.com for hosting my mods

Check out my other mods!

author: DiemCarpe
